section.p:
The content of 'amplilog1' is a comma-separated file:
ds: date stamp
ts: time stamp
server: guid of the server which is selected in the rack image
daemon_id: guid of the daemon who executed the action
stat_name: name of the statistic, see <ref>
num_ops: number of recorded operations in the statistic interval
variance: the population variance of all the values for the action
avg_millis: average duration of one operation, measured during the statistic interval
min_millis: shortest duration of an operation in the interval
min_millis_size: minimum size of an object in the statistic, expressed in MiB
max_millis: longest duration of an operation in the interval
max_millis_size: maximum size of an object in the statistic, expressed in MiB
For more information about the statistics in this log, consult
